NEED_MORE_THAN: Number of data must bigger than
NEED_LESS_THAN: Number of data must less than equal to
DESCRIPTION_REGEX_MESSAGE: Only uppercase or lowercase letters are allowed
LETTER: Must begin with an uppercase letter and followed by a lowercase letter, if there are spaces then the check will be carried out from the beginning
USERNAME_REGEX: Start with character, must write in lowercase, only contains [character, numeric, dot and underscore]
SEX_REGEX: Can only be filled with P, L, Or N
ADDITIONAL_INFO_REGEX: Must write in lowercase, only contains [character, numeric, dot and underscore]
NAME_REGEX_MESSAGE: Must begin with Uppercase and followed by lowercase, can allowed space but rule checker will be repeated
PERMISSION_REGEX_MESSAGE: Only allow lowercase, dot, dash and colon
PHOTO_REGEX: Only allows files with JPEG and PNG extensions
SUPERIOR_ID_FORMAT: Superior ID and Person Profile id cannot be the same
EMAIL_REGEX: Sorry, the email you entered is not valid. Please check your email again.
NIK_REGEX: Nik can only accept numbers, the minimum length is 16, and the maximum is 20.
